name: The Cy-Scraper
description:
Freedom-fighter Axis Steel takes it into his own hands to take down Xetro, the technological dictator AI of the Cy-Scraper, who is mind-controlling the people through their cybernetics!

A stealthy, explorative Metroidvania, journey up the Cy-scraper as you explore and unlock powerful cybernetics, uncover hidden secrets, and get past cyborg enemies!

Can you beat Xetro, before they beat you?

-------------------------------------------------

Features:

  • Expansive Metroidvania Map!
  • Intelligent Cyborg  Enemies!
  • Secrets hidden everywhere!
  • 6 unlockable upgrades!
  • One (1) Egg!

How to Play:

  • Left and Right arrow keys = move
  • Space=Jump
  • A=Shoots
  • S=Stealth
  • D=Switch ammo.

---------------------------------------------

Made in Gamemaker Studio 2

This game was made for Intro to Game Development and Design at UNCC:

The people who made it are Gemstone Incorporated:

Aliye Ozmez - Lead Artist

Sebastian "Bast" Grant - Lead Programmer

Calvin Moore - Lead Designer

Dillon Zhong - Producer
